revised_title: Potential Barrier Effects in the 3d Photoionization Continuum of Cs I
tldr: The authors studied the absorption spectrum of Cs I vapor and observed structure in the photoionization continuum. The experimental results showed discrepancies between the independent particle model predictions and the observed data, indicating the importance of electron-electron correlation processes. The findings confirm similar discrepancies reported for Xe I and suggest that continuous absorption beyond the edges remains significant at energies several hundreds of electron volts above the thresholds.
